程序包 frogger.view

类 GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • frogger.view.GameView
  • public class GameView
extends java.lang.Object

    GameView

    The GameView class is used to paint a Map to a Pane

    Besides, this class also create home, restart and instruction button and score label to make the view more meaningful and functioning.

    Main Functionality 

                    GameView.drawBakcground();
                GameView.getMap();
                GameView.getBackground();

    Use: 

                    GameView gameView = new GameView(gameLevel);
                GameView.drawBackground();
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Wenzheng Shan
    另请参阅:
    Pane, Button, Label, Map, GameController, MapFactory

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      private javafx.scene.layout.Pane background
      The Pane that is expected to be drawn with the map on it
      private javafx.scene.control.Button homeButton
      The home Button that back to the start screen when clicked
      private javafx.scene.control.Button instructionButton
      The instruction Button that show the instruction of game when clicked
      private Map map
      The Map that contains all the objects that will be drawn within Pane
      private javafx.scene.control.Button restartButton
      The restart Button that restart the game when clicked

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GameView

        public GameView​(java.lang.String gameLevel)
         throws java.lang.Exception

        Initialize the background, home button, restart button and instruction button with the operation of new.

        Create the map by calling MapFactory.createMap(String) based on the given gameLevel String

        参数:
        gameLevel - A String represent the gameLevel of current game (e.g., "simpleMode", "NormalMode", "HardMode")
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception An exception from MapReader(String) which refers to the ClassNotFoundException

    • 方法详细资料

      • drawBackground

        public void drawBackground()
        Call all the draw function about each separate actor or button and draw them on background

      • getBackground

        public javafx.scene.layout.Pane getBackground()

        return the background with the map on it

        返回:
        the background with the map on it

      • getMap

        public Map getMap()

        return the map

        返回:
        return the map

      • drawLog

        public void drawLog()

        Draws the Log from Map to Pane

      • drawTurtle

        public void drawTurtle()

        Draws the Turtle from Map to Pane

      • drawWetTurtle

        public void drawWetTurtle()

        Draws the WetTurtle from Map to Pane

      • drawEnd

        public void drawEnd()

        Draws the End from Map to Pane

      • drawAnimal

        public void drawAnimal()

        Draws the Frog from Map to Pane

      • drawObstacle

        public void drawObstacle()

        Draws the Obstacle from Map to Pane

      • drawLifeImage

        public void drawLifeImage()

        Draws the life ImageView from Map to Pane

      • drawScoreBoard

        public void drawScoreBoard()

        Draws the scoreBoard which contains three Digit from Map to Pane

        Also draws the related label("C-SCORE") to Pane by calling createLabel(String, int, int)

      • createLabel

        public javafx.scene.control.Label createLabel​(java.lang.String str,
                                              int xPos,
                                              int yPos)

        Create the label depend on the input String, X position and Y position.

        参数:
        str - The message of label
        xPos - The X position of label
        yPos - The Y position of label
        返回:
        The label with given message and the position is (xPos,yPos)

      • drawHomeButton

        public void drawHomeButton()

        Creates the Button and set the position as well as the action.

        After clicking this button, application will change to start Screen.

        Draws this Button to Pane.

      • drawRestartButton

        public void drawRestartButton()

        Creates the Button and set the position as well as the action.

        After clicking this button, application will restart the game.

        Draws this Button to Pane.

      • drawInstructionButton

        public void drawInstructionButton()

        Creates the Button and set the position as well as the action.

        After clicking this button, application will open the instruction page.

        Draws this Button to Pane.
